column3: str

Managingway wants to spread the joy of music.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Ridingway.
Ride the moon-hopper to the Carrotorium and perform the hop-step at the designated locations.
Report to Managingway.
Ever since we built the musicking station, many Ways have developed a liking for music.
Many more, however, remain unaware of the station's pleasures, and I would like you to help spread the word.
If you're willing, please report to Ridingway yonder. He has charge of the advertising effort, and will provide you with instructions.
Ah, if it isn't <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Here to help us advertise the musicking station, yes?
There isn't anything to it, really. You just need to play a spot of music for some Ways out there.
Without further ado, ride this moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium. Once there, use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!
Ride the moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium, and use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!
Some Loporrits have gathered here. Speak with Ridingway in Hoper's Hold to mount the moon-hopper, then perform the hop-step in their midst.
(-Playful Loporrit-)Ooh, what agreeable, uplifting music! I can't help but want to rollick!
(-Playful Loporrit-)We can enjoy such feel-good sounds any time at this musicking station, you say? Thank you, we'll head there at once!
(-Playful Loporrit-)Oho, if it isn't the feel-good sounds of the musicking station! Such a wonderful place that was!
(-Playful Loporrit-)It's been too long since my last visit. I'll quickly finish up my work, then head over there again and hop till I drop!
(-Languid Loporrit-)M-My tail and ears, they move as if they possessed a mind of their own... What in creation was that joyful sound?
(-Languid Loporrit-)The musicking station... I never knew such a marvelous place existed. I'll pay a visit as soon as I can.
(-Languid Loporrit-)Oh, there it is again, the sound that makes my tail and ears want to dance...
(-Languid Loporrit-)I must say, I was quite impressed with the musicking station, with its animated atmosphere. I must pay another visit after work.
There you are, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. My colleagues at the musicking station are pleased to report a measurable increase in guests.
This is no doubt due to your efforts. We hope to advertise the facility on a regular basis, and when next we do so, I trust we can depend on you again.
